title: Extremely fast non-verbal hypnosis
description:
Rejane is a student of Dr. Marco Paret. She is already a successful hypnotherapist and solves problems that are often considered impossible. In this video, she demonstrates Fascination - the power of the gaze. Without using any words, she was able to deeply hypnotized the subject and he enters in a hypnotic induction in a few moments. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
